name: Don't Mess With The Big One
name_original: Don't Mess With The Big One
description:
Made in 3 hours for Trijam #64

In Don't Mess With The Big One you are a big one demon tired of the annoying little demons that mess with you... and you start to be hungry. Eat as many as you can and get the highest score!

CONTROLS

  •  Left and right arrows to face that little bastards
  • Space to eat them when they are close enough
  • You get 1 point for each demon you eat and lose 1 life each time they reach you

CREDITS

  • Art: 0x72's Dungeon tileset
  • Bite Sound: AllSound

NOTES

I haven't had time to include the animations and more sound effects! Please don't judge me :P
